special_text:
[+2]: Exile up to one target nonplaneswalker permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield.
[-1]: Draw a card. When you do, tap up to one target permanent for each card you’ve drawn this turn. 
[-X]: [b][Search your library for a nonland card with mana value X or less, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.] [/b]
Technique {X}{G}{W}{U}
